ED_Title: Building  a peaceful and better world through sport and the Olympic ideal
ED_DecisionText: At its 55th plenary meeting, on 20 January 2022, the General Assembly took note of the solemn appeal made by the President of the General Assembly in connection with the observance of the Olympic Truce.  (footnote: A/76/648.)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
